document_title: CVE-2016-10229 Linux Kernel ipv4/udp.c Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

note.text: Multiple Fortinet products may be affected by the following Linux Kernel vulnerability:CVE-2016-10229 Linux Kernel ipv4/udp.c Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilityudp.c in the Linux kernel before 4.5 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via UDP traffic that triggers an unsafe second checksum calculation during execution of a recv system call with the MSG_PEEK flagHowever, note there is no recorded successful attack on Fortinet products.
